arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney tears into ‘stupid’ Man United star after what he has just done vs Chelsea
arts.sum: Manchester United are currently 2-0 up against Chelsea in the Premier League, but they are down to 10 men. Casemiro has been sent off after receiving his second yellow card late in the first half. arts.ttl: Rio Ferdinand brands Casemiro red card 'HARSH' as Man United star goes from hero to zero after netting for Ruben Amorim's side in chaotic Chelsea clash
arts.sum: With the Red Devils 2-0 up and coasting, the Brazilian midfielder was given his marching orders on the brink of half-time for a challenge on Andrey Santos.

arts.ttl: Chelsea set unlikely Premier League record as game unravels against Man Utd
arts.sum: Everything that could go wrong for Chelsea has gone in the first half against Man Utd as they set a new Premier League record on Saturday evening. With the Red Devils in disarray under manager Ruben Amorim, this fixture would have been seen as a perfect opportunity to grab their first win at Old Trafford […] The post Chelsea set unlikely Premier League record as game unravels against Man Utd first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: ‘Madness’: Former Chelsea player cannot believe what Blues star has just done vs Man United
arts.sum: Chelsea are 2-0 down against Manchester United in the first half after goals from Bruno Fernandes and Casemiro. The Blues are already playing with 10 men after Robert Sanchez was sent off in the fifth minute of the game. They could have easily been down to nine after the latest challenge from Marc Cucurella. arts.ttl: Robert Sanchez sent off and Cole Palmer subbed in Chelsea horror start at Man United
arts.sum: Bruno Fernandes opened the scoring just a few minutes after Sanchez saw red for a last-man challenge

arts.ttl: Cole Palmer walks straight down tunnel after being taken off just 20 minutes into Man Utd clash
arts.sum: Chelsea's Cole Palmer looked fuming as he was subbed off after 20 minutes, walking straight down the tunnel, with Enzo Maresca making a staggering three changes in the opening quarter

arts.ttl: Robert Sanchez Makes Unwanted Chelsea History With Red Card vs. Man Utd
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca’s trip to Old Trafford began with a nightmarish start.

arts.ttl: Chelsea keeper SENT OFF just five minutes into Man Utd clash after blunder
arts.sum: Chelsea made the worst possible start to their Premeir League showdown with Manchester United when goalkeeper Robert Sanchez was sent off just minutes into the game

arts.ttl: Chelsea goalkeeper Robert Sanchez SENT OFF for horrendous foul on Bryan Mbeumo just four minutes into visit to Man United
arts.sum: Chelsea goalkeeper Robert Sanchez became public enemy number one at Old Trafford after an egregious foul on Bryan Mbeumo which saw him immediately sent off.
